# Draft:World Marmalade Awards

World Marmalade Awards
The Dalemain World Marmalade Awards is an international marmalade competition and festival held annually at Dalemain Mansion in Cumbria, England. Founded in 2005, the event celebrates traditional marmalade making, fosters community through cooking, and raises funds for charitable causes. The Awards have since grown into a global celebration of citrus preserves, drawing entries from amateur and artisan marmalade makers across more than 40 countries.
